Title: Who'll Stop the Rain
Writer: Robert Stone (novel), Judith Rascoe (screenplay), Robert Stone (screenplay)
Actors: Nick Nolte, Tuesday Weld, Michael Moriarty, Anthony Zerbe
Plot: Vietnam veteran Ray Hicks gets conned into helping his buddy John Converse smuggle some heroin, only to wind up on the lam with John's wife when the deal goes sour.
